channel.title: Uhh, run.bat help
channel.description:
well, i got a new laptop and i started to code again, i got everything working. client/source, compiler working, the only thing that wont work is the run.bat. my run.bat keeps flashing when i try to run it. i set my enviroment settings again but it wont work. here the code in run.bat,
@echo off title source java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server
my enviroment settings: [IMG]http://i32.tinypic.com/2uh6drd.jpg[/img] befor any of you ask, yes i did download the newest version and the other things you may want to ask.

item.title: Uhh, run.bat help
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:

post all batch file related questions/issues in the sticky

item.title: Uhh, run.bat help
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

well, i got a new laptop and i started to code again, i got everything working.

client/source, compiler working, the only thing that wont work is the run.bat.

my run.bat keeps flashing when i try to run it.

i set my enviroment settings again but it wont work.

here the code in run.bat,

@echo off
title source
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

my enviroment settings:

befor any of you ask, yes i did download the newest version and the other things you may want to ask.
